meanings.definition: A person or thing that whirls.
meanings.sent1: The top is the whirlier in this spinning game.
meanings.sent2: The whirlier of the two dancers twirled gracefully on stage.
meanings.sent3: The whirlier, a colorful pinwheel, danced in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The whirlier of the two siblings spun faster in circles.
meanings.sent5: The whirlier, a spinning toy, mesmerized the children at the park.

meanings.sent1: The wind became whirlier as the storm approached.
meanings.sent2: The whirlier fan cooled the room quickly.
meanings.sent3: The whirlier music made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts grew whirlier as she spun in circles.
meanings.sent5: The whirlier tornado swept through the town with great force.
